acts.challenge: Make TUI state fully survive SIGUSR2 reloads and process restarts by introducing a generalized `Persistable` protocol with debounced auto-save, replacing the current surgical per-field persistence approach.
acts.build: Replace the surgical per-field TUI state persistence with a generalized `Persistable` protocol. Widgets declare their own persistable state; the app auto-discovers and collects it with debounced auto-save. Also fix the todo metadata refresh bug.
acts.gauntlet: Work advanced through iterative review/fix loops with 2 review round(s), resolving pane-theming default regression and invite-status reporting correctness before final approval.
acts.next: Manual verification gap remains for interactive TUI behavior.
